main :- value.
value :- (object | array | intLit | stringLit).
object :- ["{", repSep(keyValue, ","), "}"].
keyValue :- [stringLit, ": ", value].
intLit :- repSep(digit, "").
array :- ["[", repSep(value, ","), "]"].
digit :- [0-9].
stringLit :- ["\"", repSep([a-z], ""), "\""].
